name: Now It's My Turn (GMTK2019)
description:
Game made for the GMTK2019 game jam by Mr. K and Mikaus.

Theme is "One thing."  In our case we picked one thing moves at a time.  Each entity in the world is given a time slice.

Goal of the game: get all the blue pickups in the level.

Controls: Left Stick to move, Right Stick to aim, Right Trigger to fire if you've picked up any pickups.

You can also use WASD, arrow keys, and space.

Your score at the end is determined by how many of the pickups you still have left (the player shoots them)
